plot: Plagued with the gift, or curse, of being able to enter others dreams with the touch of a hand, Gavin Ricker has become a recluse...until his ex fiance needs his help finding her missing son.
title: Dreamweaver
plot_es: Plagued with the gift, or curse, of being able to enter others dreams with the touch of a hand, Gavin Ricker has become a recluse...until his ex fiance needs his help finding her missing son.
plot_en: Plagued with the gift, or curse, of being able to enter others dreams with the touch of a hand, Gavin Ricker has become a recluse...until his ex fiance needs his help finding her missing son.
